name: 4th International Conference on Big Data and Artificial Intelligence（BDAI2021）
content: Conference Proceedings： All submissions will be peer reviewed, and the accepted papers will be published in the BDAI2021 Conference Proceedings, and reviewed by the IEEE Conference Publication Program for IEEE Xplore, Ei Compendex and Scopus. Special Issue： Selected registered & presented papers with extension will be recommended to be published in a special issue of IEEE/CAA Journal of Automatica Sinica (JAS) (http://www.ieee-jas.net/). ISSN 2329-9266 | SCI IF: 5.129, Q1 | CiteScore: 8.3, Q1 Indexed by the Science Citation Index Expanded (SCIE)，IEEE Xplore, EI, Scopus, etc.
